name: Volleybot
description:
Your robot friend just asked for you, a fish, to join in the Volleybot tournament. Try to get 30 points to get the first spot.

Made HauntedFaun ( Art + Game Design ), JMCDMusic ( Music + Game Design ) and Galse22 ( Coding + Game Design )

Heavy inspiration was taken from the volleyball minigame of "a short hike".
